definition: abbr. for Uighur 維吾爾|维吾尔[Wei2 wu2 er3]/surname Wei
to preserve/to maintain/to hold together/dimension/vitamin (abbr. for 維生素|维生素[wei2 sheng1 su4])
to hold/to grasp/to support/to maintain/to persevere/to manage/to run (i.e. administer)/to control
to subsist/to eke out a living/to keep body and soul together

sentences.english: In this semi-successional fermentation, a prolonged period of high rate daily gas production was maintained.
sentences.chinese: 半连续补料能维持较长时间的较高日产气效率。

sentences.english: Maintain and establish standards for the correct practice of Yijin exercise.
sentences.chinese: 建立及维持易筋运动方法的标准和统一化。

sentences.english: And then it stabilized and has remained at this level.
sentences.chinese: 然后趋于平稳，并一直维持在这一水平上。

sentences.english: The poor boy made his living by selling newspapers.
sentences.chinese: 可怜的男孩靠卖报维持生活。

sentences.english: European bond markets continued to creak as buyers remained scarce.
sentences.chinese: 由于买家稀少，欧洲债券市场仍处于勉力维持的境地。

sentences.english: Her dress-making earns her enough to live on.
sentences.chinese: 她做衣服挣来的钱足够维持生活。

sentences.english: This kept us going until pay-day.
sentences.chinese: 这笔钱使我们维持到发工资。

sentences.english: We welcome the dispatch of the peace-keeping force.
sentences.chinese: 我们对派出维持和平部队此举表示欢迎。

sentences.english: Some teachers find it difficult to keep their classes in order.
sentences.chinese: 有些教师感到难以维持课堂秩序。

sentences.english: Maintain knee and toe alignment to prevent knee torquing .
sentences.chinese: 维持膝和脚趾对准阻止膝转力矩。

sentences.english: It's endless work maintaining the building in good repair.
sentences.chinese: 要维持这座大楼完好无损真是个没完没了的活。

sentences.english: The zygomaticus minor and orbicularis oris secondarily provide lateral wall stability.
sentences.chinese: 颧小肌和和口轮匝肌则辅助维持外侧壁稳定。

sentences.english: Increasingly, it includes genetic building blocks cradled in unique deep-sea creatures who thrive under conditions once thought impossible for sustaining life.
sentences.chinese: 这些深海生物的生存环境曾被认为不可能维持生命。

sentences.english: Bears establish and maintain their social position and place in the hierarchy by acting aggressively.
sentences.chinese: 建立并且维持这样立体社会的等级是靠熊的暴力。

sentences.english: Angry crowds and RouZi looking for bonzi team conflict to keep order.
sentences.chinese: 激愤的群众与肉孜找来维持秩序的棒子队发生冲突。

sentences.english: Watanabe's father is paralyzed, and he needs a machine to breathe.
sentences.chinese: 渡边的父亲瘫痪在床，需要靠仪器维持呼吸。

definition: to reinstate/to resume/to restore/to recover/to regain/to rehabilitate
to decline/to drop/to fall/to go down/to decrease
to reverse/to turn around (an undesirable situation)/(mechanics) torsion
